actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or have the prone condition.
actions.name: Bite

languages: Blink Dog, understands Sylvan but can't speak it
name: Harrow Hound [BMT]
resistances: necrotic, psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.description: The hound has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the hound's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally doesn't have the incapacitated condition.
specialTraits.name: Pack Tactics

specialTraits.description: The hound knows the distance to and direction of any creature that has come within 30 feet of it, even if that creature is on a different plane of existence. If the creature being tracked by the hound dies, the hound knows.
specialTraits.name: Supernatural Tracker
